common.citation: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
common.verification_code_sent: A verification code has been sent to {{phone}}
common.verification_mail_code_sent: A verification code has been sent to {{email}}
common.create_prospect_account: Create a prospect account to find a visitor for your property
common.create_visitor_account: Create additional visitor account to inspect properties
common.other_information: In order to finalize your registration, we need additional information.
common.address_description: This address will be the central point of your visiting area. It will never be disclosed to other users. You don't have to enter your personal address.
common.availability_description: To appear in the search results, please enter your availability to visit properties. You can add, delete or modify your availability at any time via the parameters.
common.pricing_description: With VOYO, you can earn money. In fact, you'll be paid for every visit you make with VOYO. And the best part? You set your own hourly rate!
common.identity_card_description: To ensure the security of our users, we ask you to provide us with a copy of your identity card. This document will be used to verify your identity.
common.identity_card_front: Please register the front of your identity card
common.identity_card_back: Please save the back of your identity card

prospect.noAnswer: The visitor hasn't answered your criteria yet.
prospect.subtext_type_of_property: By choosing the type of property, you can determine the duration of the visit and, therefore, estimate its cost.
prospect.subtext_choose_a_date: Please indicate the date you would like the visit to take place.
prospect.send_request_description: To unblock access to the chat, please send a request. If your request is denied, you will be refunded.
prospect.send_request_description_2: In order to make the payment, you will be redirected to the website of our external service provider Stripe.p
